content:
advertisement

Bra shopping is necessary for all females but for many its a daunting and undesirable task PERIOD Knowing what to look for beforehand and having an idea of what you want  to achieve will help you find a great bra that works for your body type PERIOD

Bust Minimizers

For the girl that wants to look just a size or two smaller bust minimizing bras get the job done PERIOD Lifting and redistributing breast tissue makes breasts look smaller but just as shapely PERIOD

Patty Stover owner of Jezebels Boutique  E PERIOD College Ave. said her store carries a minimizing bra by Wacoal PERIOD

 said Stover PERIOD

PushUp Bras

The pushup allows girls to flaunt what theyve got and more PERIOD

Stover said Jezebels carries the Wacoal iBra a seamless pushup thats winning marks in comfort and contouring has been causing a stir and has been featured on the Oprah Winfrey Show as well as the Rachael Ray Show PERIOD Offered in a variety of neutral shades this bra is guaranteed to create an illusion of a bigger bust PERIOD

Stover also said that some smallerchested girls go for the Elle Macpherson pushup bra which only goes up to a size  PERIOD

Amber Hearn seniorhotel restaurant and institutional management a former employee of Victorias Secret at the Nittany Mall said pushup bras are her favorite kind of support PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

Padded Bras

Some smallerchested girls prefer a padded bra to create a fuller silhouette underneath clothing PERIOD

Abbey Zembower manager of Connections  S PERIOD Allen St. said that the store carries a variety of padded bras by Ren Rof some of which have stylish straps PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Decently priced and in a variety of trendy colors patterns and even metallic woven styles these padded bras are worth checking out PERIOD

Jezebels also carries a few brands that feature padded bras including Betsey Johnson which feature wild animal print designs lace embellishments and even extra addon padding PERIOD

Demi Cup Bras

A demi is a bra that has underwire to support the chest but partially cuts away to expose the very top part of the breast PERIOD

 said Hearn PERIOD

But not all girls can wear this type of bra PERIOD Hearn said that girls up to a 36D can sport this look but women larger than a DDcup size should invest in a full coverage bra PERIOD

Full Coverage Bras

Full coverage bras are perfect for fullfigured women looking for a bra to shape and fully cover the chest PERIOD

Hearn said girls seeking full coverage bras cant go wrong with the especially comfortable series Body by Victoria PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

Stover said Fayreform is a good brand for full coverage but DKNY and Wacoal offer the same coverage but in a lace style PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Strapless and Convertible Bras

Bras with removable and detachable straps are great for nights out perfect for the plunging necklines tube tops and skinny strapped tanks PERIOD

Hearn said Victorias Secret has strapless and convertible bras for the Angels Very Sexy and Body by Victoria collections PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

The Ren Rot brand that Connections carries also offers a few convertible and strapless bras and even a super plunging bra which Zembower says are all popular especially during formal season PERIOD

At Jezebels Natori and Wacoal offer a strapless and convertible bra and Affintas makes a plunging bra which has a deep cut so girls can wear a more revealing top if desired PERIOD

Stover said women should make sure strapless bras have rubber inside the bands so they stay secure around their chests and dont slide up or downward PERIOD

Sports Bras

Girls who have a fuller chest and need additional support when exercising or playing sports can try Bendon Natori or Elle Macpherson supportive sports bras which are available at Jezebels PERIOD

 said Stover PERIOD

She said the straps are padded with extra fabric for comfort and that the Bendon sports bra even features a wire for added leverage PERIOD

Breast Implant Bras

For girls who have gone under the knife to better their breasts a different style of bra is necessary to accommodate the different shape PERIOD

Stover said she recently started carrying a bra by Le Mystre that is specially designed for women with implants and is gaining popularity among some female students PERIOD

Adhesive Bras

Adhesive bras are exactly what they say they are  bras that stick onto your chest PERIOD Theyre perfect if youre wearing an openback shirt dress or a cut thats hard to match without a bra showing PERIOD

Hearn said there are two major kinds of adhesive bras that are very popular for special occasions or an intricately cut shirt or dress PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Another option is the nudecolored adhesive NuBra which is available at Jezebels up to a Dcup and has been a popular sale at the store PERIOD

 Stover said PERIOD
